class libfairness.fairness_problem.FairnessProblem(inputs=None, columns=None, function=None, outputs=None, labels=None, groups_studied=[], categorical_features=[])¶

Bases: object

A class used to represent a fairness problem

…

Type

Type

outputs of the problem

Type

Type

List

result¶
